segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused that she doesn't notice the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, creating a large puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she doesn't feel the water soaking her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is calm and neutral, as if nothing out of the ordinary is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the dishes stacked neatly on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window highlights the scene, making it feel almost surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be lost in thought, completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she's in her own little world, oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of calm watching her, but also a hint of concern for the mess she's about to discover.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, contrasting with the indoor scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of her daze soon before the water causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR
